SETUP_DESC_ENABLE_REMOTE_ACCESS: You will not be able to login to this device via the Remote Access and must provide local credentials for managing this device, all its controllers as well as SSH.
SETUP_DESC_ENABLE_OPTIMIZE_NETWORK: UniFi Network automatically detects and sets the most commonly missed, but vital, settings for improved WiFi and network performance.
SETUP_DESC_ENABLE_AUTO_BACKUP: UniFi Network will periodically do backups of your setup.
SETUP_DESC_ENABLE_CLOUD_BACKUP: UniFi Network will store copy of backups in cloud and assign them to your Ubiquiti account.
SETUP_HEADER_DESC_ADVANCE_ACCESS: Change access methods and local accounts
SETUP_UPLOAD_BACKUP: Alternatively, you can upload backup file.
SETUP_HEADER_DESC_CREDENTIALS: Use your Ubiquiti Account to access your {deviceName} via the {serviceUrl} service or locally with the same credentials.
SETUP_HEADER_DESC_DEVICES_SETUP: Please select the devices you would like to configure.
SETUP_HEADER_DESC_NAME_YOUR_CONTROLLER: Use a simple name to help differentiate your controller when managing multiple networks.
SETUP_HEADER_DESC_RESTORE_CREDENTIALS: Use your Ubiquiti Account to access your cloud backups.
SETUP_HEADER_DESC_RESTORE_FROM_BACKUP: Select source of the backup to restore your setup configuration.
SETUP_HEADER_DESC_REVIEW_CONFIGURATION: Check your configuration and setup your {deviceName}.
SETUP_HEADER_DESC_UPDATE_DEVICE: Update device firmware and get the latest UniFi Network Controller.
SETUP_HEADER_DESC_WIFI_SETUP: Name your new Wi-Fi network and choose a password.
SETUP_HEADER_TITLE_CREDENTIALS: Sign in with your Ubiquiti Account
SETUP_HEADER_TITLE_RESTORE_CREDENTIALS: Sign in with your Ubiquiti Account
SETUP_BACKUP_RESTORE_MODAL_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to restore the settings from {filename} created at {datetime} for version {version}?
SETUP_BACKUP_RESTORING_MODAL_MESSAGE: The system is being restored. The controller will be restarted soon.
SETUP_LABEL_CONTROLLER_TOS_AND_EULA: By selecting this you are agreeing to end user license agreement and the terms of service.
SETUP_LABEL_ENABLE_UBIQUITI_LOGIN: Use your Ubiquiti account for local access
SETUP_LABEL_ENABLE_WIFI_COMBINE: Combine 2 GHz and 5 GHz WiFi Network Names into one
SETUP_JOURNEY_DESC_MY_CLOUD_BACKUPS: List all auto-backups assigned to my Ubiquiti account.
SETUP_JOURNEY_DESC_MY_LOCAL_BACKUPS: List all auto-backups stored on this device.
SETUP_MODAL_MESSAGE_CONFIRM_SKIP_UPDATE: To get the best experience we recommend to update device firmware first. You can always update device firmware later from Controller Settings. Do you want to skip the update now?
SETUP_RESPONSE_ERROR_UBIQUITI_CREDENTIAL: There was a problem logging into your account, please try again later.
SETUP_REVIEW_LABEL_UBIQUITI_LOGIN: Use Ubiquiti account for local access
